Package com.midaswebserver.midasweb.services

Class UserServiceImp

java.lang.Object
com.midaswebserver.midasweb.services.UserServiceImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImp extends Object implements UserService
Since:
0.0.1 UserService is the CRUD service for Users. the majority of user logic goes through the UserServiceImp

    • addSymbolToUser

      @Transactional public boolean addSymbolToUser(User user, String ticker)
      Adds a symbol to a user. This will create a symbol object linked to the user object which can be used to retrieve the saved ticker WIll return false if user or ticker is null if ticker is invalid > 4, return false if User doesn't exist, return false if ticker is already saved, return true if ticker is added, return true all else fails, return false
      Specified by:
      addSymbolToUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      user -
      ticker - like 'UEC'
      Returns:
      boolean based on the success of the transaction

    • getClientIp

      public String getClientIp(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      takes request and finds the user's Ip. Used in place of user id when logging
      Specified by:
      getClientIp in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      request - HttpServletRequest takes the servlet request received from a post method
      Returns:
      remote IP address
